entries.text: Banco de Portugal releases today, in table A.19 of the Statistical Bulletin and in BPstat, statistics on corporations in the Central Balance Sheet Data-.

entries.title: Monetary policy decisions - European Central Bank
entries.text: 12 December 2024. The Governing Council today decided to lower the three key ECB interest rates by 25 basis points.

entries.title: Monetary policy decisions - European Central Bank
entries.text: The Governing Council today decided to raise the three key ECB interest rates by 50 basis points and it expects to raise them further.
